1. <comment>I also use "Bypass Paywalls Clean filter". But when Adguard Tracking Protection filter is used, the paywall can not be unlocked. Adg tracking is breaking the functionality of Bypass Paywalls Clean filter.
2. It seems this rule `nytimes.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "Navigator.prototype.joinParakeetInterestGroup", "noopFunc")` is the culprit. Creating an unblock/allow rule for this one makes the page show the full article. Please do something to make ADG tracking compatible with Bypass Paywall Clean filter in this case. 

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29574622/fa2ebb11-9bd4-4b3f-bbe4-1ca627c559ed)


</details>

comment.body:

I have added additional rules for anti-adblock.

comment.body:
I apologize for my broken English. 

If I go to Google map, now I do have location working thanks to your line `@@||google.com/maps/$stealth=location`. 

But if I go to any other site that needs localization, then I never have the option of authorizing it via the authorized / refused popup.  

If I disable Adguard the location request popup is displayed fine and everything works. I'd like to know how to set a filter that authorizes localization for all sites, not just google.

comment.body:
Sponsored posts are correctly hidden on my end.
In the case of Firefox extension (https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/158937#issuecomment-1693255648) it might not work, because extension for Firefox cannot update/download new JavaScript rules.
Adding:
```adblock

div:not([class], [id]):not([style*=\"display: none\"]), div[role=\"main\"] div > h3 ~ div > div[class] > div:not([class], [id]) div:not([class], [id], [dir], [data-0], [style]), div[role=\"main\"] div labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.merigotech.fillwords](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.merigotech.fillwords) ### Comment Username: @NUser2018 > Перестала блокироватся реклама в приложении игры "Филворды" (игра от разработчика Lunapp по поиску слов на полях из букв) (ссылка на это приложение в Google Play была предоставлена на одном из предыдущих шагов при заполнении формы репорта о пропущенной рекламе). Реклама на уровнях во время прохождения уровней внизу и при переходах между уровнями на следующий уровень. Скриншоты прилагаются. Реклама разная и меняется. Сам пока не встречал, но судя по отзывам пользователей в Google Play бывает даже реклама со звуком. До этого времени AdGuard успешно блокировал всю рекламу в этом приложении, теперь реклама в этом приложении появилась и у меня. Реклама мешает, но игра очень хорошая и интересная, надеюсь команда AdGuard сможет побыстрее пофиксить и снова заблокировать рекламу в этом приложении. Пользуюсь платной версией AdGuard. Заранее спасибо. С уважением Александр. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/8m27fxogrpk44sgo80wg448cw0kw400fpphkjryq8o.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/b7n7fzomohwgkc48gsw48cw4cg080swh5ivzot7u3k.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
> [#158937 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/158937#issuecomment-1695107117)
> @bouscram What is the second problem? Page loads fine on my macbook.

If you're referring the 2nd screenshot, it's the normal view that the support wizard needs, not another problem.

Some more explanations related to my issue: this is something I've seen for quite a while: the FB page loads slowly (only the first posts are usually shown at first, then others come but it can take several minutes, and sometimes nothing more is shown), and quite simultaneously, some text appear on the left (as shown in my 1st screenshot), from top to bottom.

I don't know if there is a link, but this clearly happens less frequently on my (work) Macbook than on my (home) Mac mini with a large screen where it is almost all the time. I'll compare the Adguard settings tonight in case they are different. Maybe there is a link with the fact that on the large screen more posts (and potentially sponsored posts) are displayed

comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Maybe we can add `$replace` for apps, for example:
```adblock
||a.aagag.com/js/AAGAG_AA.js$replace=/https:\/\/pagead2\.googlesyndication\.com\/pagead\/js\/adsbygoogle\.js/\//
||a.aagag.com/js/AAGAG_AA.js$replace=/(result\.indexOf\('(google-adsense|googlesyndication)'\))>-1/\$1>=0/
```
Seems to works fine on my end.

comment.body:
> You can disable the filter until the author fixes it. Btw, this is a temporary rule that you can add to User rules.
> 
> ```
> ||accounts.google.com/gsi/client$script,third-party,badfilter
> ```

yes. I think this rule helps, and is a login error problem when blocked by adguard
I have entered it in the user rules and refreshed the site, and sure enough it works. login using google now work. I hope this rule can be included in the adguard filter as soon as possible

The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` in AdGuard tray menu.

<details>

> Is there a way to avoid YouTube's new ad blocker warnings and video player disable. Thank you so much for all your great work protecting us from the internet annoyance.

Disable all other extension and update filters.

> Should we handle the following uBO Reddit issue? 

Nobody knows how to address that so far. Most of reports here only post URLs and SS, but for YT it's never enough, exact steps to reproduce without any interference (other blocker etc.) will be required.

issue.title: nytimes.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.151

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.nytimes.com/2023/08/26/business/economy/us-economy-china.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>I also use "Bypass Paywalls Clean filter". But when Adguard Tracking Protection filter is used, the paywall can not be unlocked. Adg tracking is breaking the functionality of Bypass Paywalls Clean filter.
2. It seems this rule `nytimes.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "Navigator.prototype.joinParakeetInterestGroup", "noopFunc")` is the culprit. Creating an unblock/allow rule for this one makes the page show the full article. Please do something to make ADG tracking compatible with Bypass Paywall Clean filter in this case. 

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29574622/fa2ebb11-9bd4-4b3f-bbe4-1ca627c559ed)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Hi,
After updating filters it works correctly on my end.
That's how it looks like with `Bypass Paywalls Clean filter` enabled:
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29142494/4d54f843-d23e-4abf-b1bd-64f3e7c1f7c1)

</details>

And with disabled `Bypass Paywalls Clean filter`:
<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29142494/94304908-b4cb-4a5c-8bd9-bebf00118bd5)

</details>

There were 2 similar rules which when used together caused a problem, but now I cannot reproduce it anymore.

The mentioned rule:
```adblock
nytimes.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "Navigator.prototype.joinParakeetInterestGroup", "noopFunc")
```
is required for this issue - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/135303#issuecomment-1356927010, without it website is broken.

If issue still occurs even after updating filters, then I recommend to add exception to user rules:
```adblock
nytimes.com#@%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "Navigator.prototype.joinParakeetInterestGroup", "noopFunc")
```

issue.title: Google Play: com.merigotech.fillwords
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.merigotech.fillwords](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.merigotech.fillwords) ### Comment Username: @NUser2018 > Перестала блокироватся реклама в приложении игры "Филворды" (игра от разработчика Lunapp по поиску слов на полях из букв) (ссылка на это приложение в Google Play была предоставлена на одном из предыдущих шагов при заполнении формы репорта о пропущенной рекламе). Реклама на уровнях во время прохождения уровней внизу и при переходах между уровнями на следующий уровень. Скриншоты прилагаются. Реклама разная и меняется. Сам пока не встречал, но судя по отзывам пользователей в Google Play бывает даже реклама со звуком. До этого времени AdGuard успешно блокировал всю рекламу в этом приложении, теперь реклама в этом приложении появилась и у меня. Реклама мешает, но игра очень хорошая и интересная, надеюсь команда AdGuard сможет побыстрее пофиксить и снова заблокировать рекламу в этом приложении. Пользуюсь платной версией AdGuard. Заранее спасибо. С уважением Александр. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/8m27fxogrpk44sgo80wg448cw0kw400fpphkjryq8o.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
@Sergey-Lyapin Фикс уже вышел в релиз? Похоже не работает или работает не полностью. Как минимум остаются следы от рекламы (скриншоты прилагаются) ну или реклама есть но просто не успевает прогружатся поскольку сейчас у меня есть некоторые технические проблемы с мобипльным интернетом. Раньше до недавнего времени от рекламы в этом приложении не было видно совсем ничего. На втором скриншоте рекламы нет, там нажимаешь кнопку продолжить для перехода на следующий уровень после чего при переходе между уровнями появляется реклама на весь экран (следы от неё показаны на третьем скриншоте) которую закрываешь крестиком в углу после чего переходщит на следующий уровень. На первом скриншоте при прохождении уровней тоже есть как минимум следы от рекламы внизу.
![1](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/43743908/e82d4f73-a3a9-4ae4-bcc1-4953e987350b)
![2](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/43743908/404cbfc1-ea90-4443-a7f9-2567a2c7008e)
![3](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/43743908/eca12086-bec6-4349-85f4-082e25c0dfb2)

issue.title: nytimes.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.151

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.nytimes.com/2023/08/26/business/economy/us-economy-china.html

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>I also use "Bypass Paywalls Clean filter". But when Adguard Tracking Protection filter is used, the paywall can not be unlocked. Adg tracking is breaking the functionality of Bypass Paywalls Clean filter.
2. It seems this rule `nytimes.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "Navigator.prototype.joinParakeetInterestGroup", "noopFunc")` is the culprit. Creating an unblock/allow rule for this one makes the page show the full article. Please do something to make ADG tracking compatible with Bypass Paywall Clean filter in this case. 

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29574622/fa2ebb11-9bd4-4b3f-bbe4-1ca627c559ed)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I'm not sure if it's the same issue as described, but if I open article in incognito mode, then sometimes on first visit paywall is not unblocked.
The same happens if I add mentioned exception rule to user rules, or even with whole `AdGuard Tracking Protection filter` disabled, so probably it's not related to this rule.

<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/29574622/fa2ebb11-9bd4-4b3f-bbe4-1ca627c559ed)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Hi, After updating filters it works correctly on my end. That's how it looks like with `Bypass Paywalls Clean filter` enabled:
> 
> Screenshot
> And with disabled `Bypass Paywalls Clean filter`:
> 
> Screenshot
> There were 2 similar rules which when used together caused a problem, but now I cannot reproduce it anymore.
> 
> The mentioned rule:
> 
> ```
> nytimes.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "Navigator.prototype.joinParakeetInterestGroup", "noopFunc")
> ```
> 
> is required for this issue - [#135303 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/135303#issuecomment-1356927010), without it website is broken.
> 
> If issue still occurs even after updating filters, then I recommend to add exception to user rules:
> 
> ```
> nytimes.com#@%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "Navigator.prototype.joinParakeetInterestGroup", "noopFunc")
> ```

I see. Can you try one more thing? For example, for me, after removing nytimes cookie from my browser if I visit the article reported in this issue above then the first time the full article is loaded most of the time. But then if I reload the page or go to nytimes home page and click on other articles on the home page then articles becomes locked again and "Subscribe for $0.25/Week" button appears beside the login button on top right. 
Apart from your suggested exception rule, the only other thing that is working for me is this rule `nytimes.com##+js(cookie-remover, /^/)`
But of course, this rule can not be put into Adguard Base filter since it removes cookies every single time. 
If you can not reproduce then I'll just keep using it by putting this in user rules.
